IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+D.EXPLANATION: The degree to which data correctly represents the real-world value.
IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+D.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Data Entries / Total Data Entries) * 100

IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+D.EXPLANATION: Measures whether all required data is present.
IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+D.FORMULA: (Number of Complete Data Entries / Total Data Entries) * 100

IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+D.EXPLANATION: Measures the efficiency of data queries.
IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+D.FORMULA: (Average Query Response Time / Target Query Response Time) * 100

IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+D.EXPLANATION: The time taken to generate reports from data.
IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+D.FORMULA: Total Time for Report Generation / Number of Reports

IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+D.EXPLANATION: Measures the extent to which available data is used for decision-making.
Overall score representing the quality of data based on multiple criteria.
IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+D.FORMULA: (Sum of Quality Ratings / Number of Data Records)

IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+D.EXPLANATION: The time taken to generate actionable insights from data.
IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+D.FORMULA: Total Time to Generate Insights / Number of Insights Generated

IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+D.EXPLANATION: The number of security incidents affecting data.
IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+D.FORMULA: Total Number of Data Security Incidents
